articles.description: EXCLUSIVE BY MIKE KEEGAN: Martial's wife, Melanie, took to Instagram to reveal that she had been subjected to further abuse which included death threats to both herself and her husband.
articles.content:
Manchester United have approached Anthony Martial to help with security at his house after racist trolls targeted him and his wife online.
The France forward, 25, was subjected to sickening abuse fo… [+2382 chars]
